text: A modern glass chandelier. Museum of Modern Glass Art is a museum dedicated to contemporary glass art in Odunpazarı, Eskişehir, Turkey. The museum was established with the cooperation of Eskişehir Metropolitan Municipality, Anadolu University and a private group for friends of glass in 2007. Turkey's first museum of its kind, it exhibits works of 58 domestic and 10 foreign artists. ==References== Category:Museums in Eskişehir Category:Glass museums and galleries Category:Art museums and galleries in Turkey Category:Museums established in 2007 Category:2007 establishments in Turkey Category:Odunpazarı
